explanation: [0-0] A man is standing on the ground in front of a wall with windows, wearing glasses, a blue, white, and purple shirt, and black pants. He is holding a red rag and placing it on an area of tiles. There is yellow mud on the tiles and the ground, and in the open space in front of the wall, there is a silver metal basin with yellow liquid in it.

[0-4] The man is cleaning the tiles on the wall with the rag. Then, he puts the rag into the metal basin on the ground to rinse it. Immediately afterwards, he continues cleaning the tiles. Then, a man walks by from the left, wearing a yellow T-shirt and black pants, holding an orange object in his hand. He walks up to the man who is cleaning the tiles and kicks the metal basin away. The man cleaning the tiles angrily throws the rag on the ground. Subsequently, the man in the yellow T-shirt places an orange pipe in front of the man who was cleaning the tiles. The scene then changes to a faucet tied to a cement wall, with a hand screwing a yellow connector onto the faucet.
